home.employersSubtitle: Smart tools for finding candidates, managing vacancies and building your HR brand

parma.encouragement: Don't give up, you can do it! 💪

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.text: Hi! I'm Parma, your helper on IT-Grads platform! Let me show you around.
welcome.voice: Hi! I'm Parma, your helper on IT-Grads platform! Let me show you around.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.text: Here you can fill in your resume, add skills and experience. The more complete your profile — the better your chances of finding a job!
profile.voice: Here you can fill in your resume, add skills and experience. The more complete your profile, the better your chances of finding a job!

roadmap.title: Development Roadmaps
roadmap.text: Choose a direction and follow the roadmap. I'll help you every step of the way!
roadmap.voice: Choose a direction and follow the roadmap. I'll help you every step of the way!

codebattle.title: CodeBattle
codebattle.text: Practice programming and compete with others! Solve tasks and increase your rating.
codebattle.voice: Practice programming and compete with others! Solve tasks and increase your rating.

interview.title: AI Interview
interview.text: Prepare for interviews with artificial intelligence! It will ask you questions and give feedback.
interview.voice: Prepare for interviews with artificial intelligence! It will ask you questions and give feedback.

jobs.title: Job Vacancies
jobs.text: Here you'll find job postings from employers. Apply and find your dream job!
jobs.voice: Here you'll find job postings from employers. Apply and find your dream job!

complete.title: Done!
complete.text: Now you know the basics! If you need help — I'm always here. Good luck with your job search! 🐕
complete.voice: Now you know the basics! If you need help, I'm always here. Good luck with your job search!

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.text: Hello! I'm Parma, I'll help you get started on IT-Grads platform. Let's explore the main features.
welcome.voice: Hello! I'm Parma, I'll help you get started on IT-Grads platform. Let's explore the main features.

profile.title: Company Profile
profile.text: Fill in your company information. This will help candidates learn more about you.
profile.voice: Fill in your company information. This will help candidates learn more about you.

candidates.title: Candidate Search
candidates.text: Here you'll find graduates with the skills you need. Use filters for precise search.
candidates.voice: Here you'll find graduates with the skills you need. Use filters for precise search.

vacancies.title: Vacancy Management
vacancies.text: Create vacancies and receive applications from motivated candidates.
vacancies.voice: Create vacancies and receive applications from motivated candidates.

messenger.title: Messenger
messenger.text: Communicate with candidates directly through the built-in messenger.
messenger.voice: Communicate with candidates directly through the built-in messenger.

complete.title: Done!
complete.text: Now you're ready to go! If you have questions — I'm always here. Good luck finding talent! 🐕
